content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step assembly instructions.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
The structure consists of two separate parts:

1. Left Structure:
- Has 4 orange cylindrical pillars
- 2 yellow rectangular blocks on top of the pillars
- 1 yellow semi-circular cap at the very top
- 1 orange triangular piece on top

2. Right Structure:
- A red base with two arches
- 4 green rectangular blocks standing vertically behind it

Block Count: 
- 4 orange cylinders
- 2 yellow rectangles
- 1 yellow semi-circle
- 1 orange triangle
- 2 red arch pieces
- 4 green vertical blocks

Assembly Instructions:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 # First red arch piece
    Step2: Move block with index 2 # Second red arch piece
    Step3: Move block with index 6 # First green block
    Step4: Move block with index 6 # Second green block
    Step5: Move block with index 6 # Third green block
    Step6: Move block with index 6 # Fourth green block
    Step7: Move block with index 8 # First orange pillar
    Step8: Move block with index 8 # Second orange pillar
    Step9: Move block with index 8 # Third orange pillar
    Step10: Move block with index 8 # Fourth orange pillar
    Step11: Move block with index 7 # First yellow rectangle
    Step12: Move block with index 7 # Second yellow rectangle
    Step13: Move block with index 10 # Yellow semi-circular cap
    Step14: Move block with index 15 # Orange triangle piece
}

Each block is selected from the dictionary to match exactly in orientation and color as shown in the target image, with no rotations needed.
